==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|期|日|前|投|票}}

===Etymology 1===
Compound of {{compound|期日|tr1=kijitsu|t1=date|前|tr2=zen|t2=before|投票|tr3=tōhyō|t3=vote|lang=ja}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/kidʑitsuzen toːçjoː/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|きじつぜん とうひょう}}

# casting a voting ballot prior to the established date of voting; early voting

===Etymology 2===
Compound of {{compound|期日|tr1=kijitsu|t1=date|前|tr2=mae|t2=before|投票|tr3=tōhyō|t3=vote|lang=ja}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/kidʑitsumae toːçjoː/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|きじつまえ とうひょう}}

# casting a voting ballot prior to the established date of voting; early voting
